info.name: Zalo API RESTful - Secure
info.description: Complete RESTful API for Zalo integration with Secret Key Authentication

body.raw:
{
  "blockName": false,
  "signAdminMsg": true,
  "setTopicOnly": false,
  "enableMsgHistory": true,
  "joinAppr": false,
  "lockCreatePost": false,
  "lockCreatePoll": false,
  "lockSendMsg": false,
  "lockViewMember": true
}

}
